abstract: Argentinian court sentences Alfredo Astiz and 11 other former military and police officers to life in prison for crimes committed during the 1976-83 military dictatorship.
snippet: Alfredo Astiz and 11 other former military and police officers in Argentina have been sentenced to life in prison for crimes committed during the 1976-83 military dictatorship.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: Alfredo Astiz and 11 other former military and police officers in Argentina have been sentenced to life in prison for crimes committed during the 1976-83 military dictatorship.

headline.main: Argentina: 12 Given Life Sentences for Crimes During Dictatorship
